    • Method Detail

      • exp

        public static RigidTransform exp(Twist twist)
        ethaneade.com/lie_groups.pdf Exponential map for 2D rigid transformation Basically this converts a Twist ---(exponential map)---> transformation Kind of like an differential position ---(integral)---> position

        Twist: [[dx] [dy] [dtheta]]

        Rotation: [[cos(dtheta), -sin(dtheta)] [sin(dtheta), cos(dtheta)]]

        Translation: [[sin(dtheta)/dtheta, -(1-cos(dtheta)/detheta)] * [[dx] [(1-cos(dtheta)/dtheta), sin(dtheta)/dtheta) ]] [dy]]

        Parameters:
        twist - Input twist
        Returns:
        Transformation based on the twist

      • getTranslation

        public Translation getTranslation()

      • getRotation

        public Rotation getRotation()

      • transform

        public RigidTransform transform(RigidTransform other)
        Transforms (rotates + translates) this transformation matrix by another transformation matrix Basically multiplies two transformation matrices (see above the class declaration) together.

        In other words, we first rotation this translation vector by the other rotation vector (taking into account this rotation vector), then we translate this translation vector by the other translation vector

        Parameters:
        other - Transformation matrix to transform this matrix by
        Returns:
        The transformed matrix

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
